summary: It\'s not just the mages who kill them with fire!
descriptionHtml:
================
[b]Description[/b]
================

Often cast aside in favor of a second weapon, or one of those oh-so-fancy shields, the torch is ready to make it\'s comeback as the favored off-hand of adventurers everywhere!

This mod removes the duration from the basic \"torch\" item, allowing them to burn forever and saving you the hassle of stealing them from giants.
Additionally, it will increase the damage and duration of the fire effect... which makes much more sense, considering that fire tends to hurt.

Along with the four options for torch longevity and fire damage, there is now an optional esp file that adds a brand new perk for torch-combat enthusiasts!
\"Torch Mastery\" has 3 ranks, each increasing the damage dealt by torch-bashing by 50%. This perk is unrelated to any skill; much like the Unarmored Perks mod that I made, they are dependent on your character level, rather than skill level. The first rank is available at level 5, the next at 10, and the last rank at level 20. Now, stop reading and start your career as a torch specialist!

================
[b]Official-Looking Notes Section![/b]
================

[b]V1.2[/b]

This update adds a new, optional esp file:

Added perk \"Torch Mastery\" in the One-Handed perk tree. Increases bashing damage with a torch by 50/100/150%.

[b]V1.1[/b]

This update offers 3 new .esp files. Just download the archive with the right name, and go nuts. ^-^

Details on all four esp files below!:


[b]Everlasting with Low Damage[/b] inceases the fire damage effect to 2 damage for 4 seconds; total 8 fire damage.

--------------
[b]Everlasting with High Damage[/b] increases the fire damage effect to 8 damage for 4 seconds; total 32 fire damage.

--------------
[b]Non-Everlasting with Low Damage[/b] increases the fire damage effect to 2 damage for 4 seconds; total 8 fire damage.

--------------
[b]Non-Everlasting with High Damage[/b] increases the fire damage effect to 8 damage for 4 seconds; total 32 fire damage.



[b]V1.0[/b]-Outdated

-Torch duration removed.
-Torch bashing spell damage changed to 2 damage over 4 seconds.


================


For a good perk tweak that increases your parry effectiveness: 

http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10397


-As always comments, compliments, endorsements will be met with squeals of joy!
